import React from 'react'; import CodeField from '../../EditCode/EditorDeCodigo/CodeField'; import { AiFillHeart, AiFillMessage } from "react-icons/ai"; import './style.scss'; import '../../EditCode/EditorDeCodigo/highlight.css'; function Project({ nome, descricao, color, code }) { return (

{nome}

{descricao}
